00038 
00039   class Event : public Hypertable::ReferenceCount {
00040   public:
00041     Event(uint32_t mask) : m_mask(mask), m_notification_count(0) { 
00042       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(ms_next_event_id_mutex);
00043       m_id = ms_next_event_id++;
00044       return; 
00045     }
00046     virtual ~Event() { return; }
00047 
00048     uint64_t get_id() { return m_id; }
00049 
00050     uint32_t get_mask() { return m_mask; }
00051 
00052     void increment_notification_count() {
00053       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00054       m_notification_count++;
00055     }
00056     void decrement_notification_count() {
00057       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00058       m_notification_count--;
00059       if (m_notification_count == 0)
00060         m_cond.notify_all();
00061     }
00062     void wait_for_notifications() {
00063       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00064       if (m_notification_count != 0)
00065         m_cond.wait(lock);
00066     }
00067 
00068     virtual uint32_t encoded_length() = 0;
00069     virtual void encode(Hypertable::CommBuf *cbuf) = 0;
00070 
00071   protected:
00072 
00073     static boost::mutex  ms_next_event_id_mutex;
00074     static uint64_t      ms_next_event_id;
00075 
00076     boost::mutex      m_mutex;
00077     boost::condition  m_cond;
00078     uint64_t m_id;
00079     uint32_t m_mask;
00080     uint32_t m_notification_count;
00081   };
00082 
00083   typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<Event> HyperspaceEventPtr;

00090   class EventNamed : public Event {
00091   public:
00092     EventNamed(uint32_t mask, std::string name) : Event(mask), m_name(name) { return; }
00093     virtual uint32_t encoded_length() { return 12 + Hypertable::Serialization::encoded_length_string(m_name); }
00094     virtual void encode(Hypertable::CommBuf *cbuf) { 
00095       cbuf->append_long(m_id);
00096       cbuf->append_int(m_mask);
00097       cbuf->append_string(m_name);
00098     }
00099   private:
00100     std::string m_name;
00101   };

00113       cbuf->append_long(m_id);
00114       cbuf->append_int(m_mask);
00115       cbuf->append_int(m_mode);

00125   class EventLockReleased : public Event {
00126   public:
00127     EventLockReleased() : Event(EVENT_MASK_LOCK_RELEASED) { return; }
00128     virtual uint32_t encoded_length() { return 12; }
00129     virtual void encode(Hypertable::CommBuf *cbuf) { 
00130       cbuf->append_long(m_id);
00131       cbuf->append_int(m_mask);
00132     }

00139   class EventLockGranted : public Event {
00140   public:
00141     EventLockGranted(uint32_t mode, uint64_t generation) : Event(EVENT_MASK_LOCK_GRANTED), m_mode(mode), m_generation(generation) { return; }
00142     virtual uint32_t encoded_length() { return 24; }
00143     virtual void encode(Hypertable::CommBuf *cbuf) { 
00144       cbuf->append_long(m_id);
00145       cbuf->append_int(m_mask);
00146       cbuf->append_int(m_mode);
00147       cbuf->append_long(m_generation);
00148     }
